title: Alt Colombia
desc:
Post 1120
- While you own this, every other round draw Pot of Weed [420]
- Once per game, while you own this, the cards in your hand have a civil war. The host divides up your hand where cards of similer nature are on the same side (it doesnt have to be even), and then a coin toss decides the winner. The losing side is all discarded.
